column3: US Central Appalachian coal spot price index ‡
column4: Japan coking coal import cif price
column5: Japan steam coal import cif price

column1: † Source: McCloskey Coal Information Service.  Prices for 1990-2000 are the average of the monthly marker, 2001-2013 the average of weekly prices.
‡ Source: Platts.  Prices are for CAPP 12,500 Btu, 1.2 SO2 coal, fob.
Prices for 1990-2000 are by coal price publication date, 2001-2013 by coal price assessment date.
Note:  CAPP = Central Appalachian; cif = cost+insurance+freight (average prices); fob = free on board.
